file_content.text: I see you found the droid: excellent. This data should lead you to this plasma-sealed jar.
Apparently, Nar Shaddaa's original architects deliberately engineered a fault in the transport system. A secret route.
Now their secret is ours. Take a public speeder to the following coordinates; it should trigger whatever they had to hide.
My lord Xaresh, this droid contains all the relevant information on the plasma-sealed jar you seek.
You were correct. There is a glitch in the Nar Shaddaa transport system; an ancient glitch which can be triggered.
If you can suffer to use a public speeder, my lord, take it to these coordinates. The glitch should do the rest.
